mapper.sql: SELECT meetingId, meetingTitle, meetingDate, numOfPeople, maxPeople, meetingPlace, memo, meetingInfo, meetingInfoDetail, creatorId, close, cancel FROM irregularmeeting_view
mapper.select: SELECT vi.meetingid, vi.meetingtitle, vi.numofpeople, vi.maxpeople, vi.meetingplace, vi.memo, vi.meetinginfo, vi.meetinginfodetail, vi.creatorid, vi.meetingdate, vi.close, vi.cancel FROM irregularmeeting_view vi LEFT OUTER JOIN member_meeting mm ON vi.meetingid = mm.meetingid GROUP BY vi.meetingid, vi.meetingtitle, vi.numofpeople, vi.maxpeople, vi.meetingplace, vi.memo, vi.meetinginfo, vi.meetinginfodetail, vi.creatorid, vi.meetingdate, vi.close, vi.cancel ORDER BY count(mm.heart) DESC
WHERE meetingInfo = #{category} ORDER BY MEETINGID DESC
